tweet: Best cure for teen sexting: good communication, loving guidance, valuing your child so they don't seek it elsewhere inappropriately
Kids on spring break. Daughter and I heading to the gym after bowls of porridge.
Teen bullying results in another suicide. This time there are charges against the bullies. It's about time.
Besides lawsuits, bullying can be prevented with early childhood nonviolence classes and victim advocacy clubs in middle & high schools.
Boy's sexting collection considered child porn. See today's column @ http://straighttalkforteens.com
